column1: Imprisonment  and  a  fine  of  Rs.10000/-  with  a  default  sentence  of  1  year
imprisonment for the second count and the Death Sentence for the third count.

column2: Aggrieved by the said conviction and the sentence the accused appellant

column1: has preferred his appeal to the Court of Appeal.

column2: The  appellant  was  connected  through  Zoom  technology  and  informed

column1: Court  that  he  has  given  instructions  to  his  Counsel  to  argue  the  matter  in  his
physical absence, due to the covid pandemic.
